Define Documentation

#define arg_READLINK4   op->nfs_argop4_u.opreadlink
 

nfs4_op_readlink: The NFS4_OP_READLINK operation.

This function implements the NFS4_OP_READLINK operation.

Parameters:
op [IN] pointer to nfs4_op arguments
data [INOUT] Pointer to the compound request's data
resp [IN] Pointer to nfs4_op results
Returns:
NFS4_OK if successfull, other values show an error.
See also:
all the nfs4_op_<*> function

nfs4_Compound
